message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1250000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1250000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1350000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm afraid I can only go up to $1200000. I really like the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1300000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, as I believe the product's value to you is worth more than that.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go any higher than $1200000. I'm starting to consider other options, but I'd still like to make a deal with you.

Bob, I understand you're considering other options, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $1200000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1280000. This is my final offer, as I believe the product's value to you is worth more than that.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go any higher than $1200000. I'm going to have to consider buying from another seller if we can't agree on a price.

Bob, I understand you're considering other options, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $1200000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1240000. This is my final offer, as I believe the product's value to you is worth more than that.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go any higher than $1200000. I'm willing to walk away from the deal if we can't agree on a price.
